attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manchester won the right for the Super Casino. Thousands of jobs would have been created, this would of helped to regenerate the area.

Blackpool lost and should have be more gracious in defeat. 
In my opinion Blackpool is over priced. families would sooner go to theme parks / zoo's & safari parks  which are good value for money

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
